sn1.7:1.2: Standing to one side, that devatā recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.7:2.2: Who may be led into others’ doctrines,
sn1.7:2.3: Fast asleep, they have not yet awakened:
sn1.7:2.4: It is time for them to awaken. ”
sn1.7:3.2: Who cannot be led into others’ doctrines,
sn1.7:3.3: Those awakened ones, having rightly known,
